com.bittercreektech.xmlmc.api

Class Session

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bittercreektech.xmlmc.api.Service
      • com.bittercreektech.xmlmc.api.Session

  • public class Session
extends Service
    api.Service.java

    Interface to all the xmlmc session methods. Before anything else can be done a call to one of the logon methods must be made. Each method returns an instance of the object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Session(Connection connection)
      Setup the session API by calling the super constructor defined in Service.Service(Connection, String)
